summary: Adds a new, standalone hammer based on a well known Runescape weapon.
descriptionHtml:
[center][url=https://www.facebook.com/johnskyrim][img]http://i.imgur.com/SkMFU4n.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][youtube]Kb3gR_ufypI[/youtube] [youtube]ioqtP3TKHz8[/youtube][/center]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/0zhyXNN.jpg[/img]
[b]FEEL FREE TO ADD YOUR OWN SCREENSHOTS![/b]

[b]About[/b]

The Granite Maul was a popular weapon of choice for player killing in Runescape.

I decided to create it for Skyrim because I felt the design could fit in well with the game and because I thought it would be fun to create a high quality hammer that people might actually consider using. The Granite Maul is slow but still strong.

Both model and textures were created by me using 3ds Max 2011/2014 and Photoshop CS6. [b]

[b][color=#ffff00]What this mod includes:[/color][/b]Â A unique, oversized Maul.[/b]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Location[/b]

You will need to find the small encampment near Rorikstead. It is occupied by Twig, Berry and Dad whom you may remember from the Troll Stronghold quest! Once they are defeated, the Granite Maul should be lootable!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Installation:[/b]

Use Nexus Mod Manager

or

Extract the files of the archive to your Skyrim Data Folder

granitemaul.esp
meshes/weapons/granitemaul
textures/weapons/granitemaul

Please remember to enable the .esp after you have installed the files :)

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Uninstall Instructions:[/b]

Remove using Nexus Mod Manager

or

Simply delete the following files/folders:

granitemaul.esp
meshes/weapons/granitemaul
textures/weapons/granitemaul

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Questions:[/b]

Q. I've never played Runescape, what does the weapon do?
A. The Granite Maul in Runescape offered a special attack that was two quick hits. The weapon was slow due to its size, however it was still a strong melee weapon. Currently it staggers opponents.

Q. Do you plan on making that special attack?
A. It would require messing with animations but in the future yes, I'd like to revise the mod.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[b]Notes:[/b]

Due to it's size, there are a few clipping errors when it's placed on the back. This isn't too much of a problem when quivers are unequipped.

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
If for some reason the files do not work, cause crashes
or any other problems, please do not hesitate to contact me.

All screenshots are taken directly from the game and resized down from 1920x1080 to 1280x720. No other editing has been done.

Thanks and I hope you enjoy this Skyrim Mod!

PS. DO NOT UPLOAD THIS FILE ANYWHERE ELSE!

[img]http://i.imgur.com/qzCZH0C.png[/img]
[center][color=yellow][b]
Please check out my other mods![/b][/color]
